How to prompt the new GPT 5 (with 6-step formula).

Save this P.R.O.M.P.T. framework to master it:

→ Purpose: State the goal, allowed tools, and what “done” means. 
Pick minimal or high reasoning effort.

→ Role: Give a persona + clear tool rules. 
Remove contradictions for cleaner reasoning.

→ Order of Action: Ask for a quick plan, then execution, then a short “done” summary. Add “keep going until solved” if needed.

→ Mould the Format: Define style, structure, and length. 
Restate every 3–5 turns for consistency.

→ Personality: Set mood, tone, and verbosity (short / medium / long) to match your audience.

→ Tight Controls: Cap tool calls if needed (e.g., “max 2 lookups”), 
Or insist on full persistence for complex work.

To read my guide on ChatGPT-5 at how-to-ai.store.
